replies.body: Zoe is not Ziggs... So I don't know how you expect them to have similar grading scales.  Might as well expect Janna to get as many kills as a Ziggs or Varus in ARAM to get an S.  Also,_ you did not do that well for a Ziggs in aram_.  So my guess is what is wrong is your expectations and comprehension of the grading system.

i just disregard ur opinion.... if u cant show me a better score then there is no reason for u to judge and waste the message board space just to get a lame comment out....

It's not a judgement.  It is just watching other Ziggs in ARAM play.  https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2797675236/226469718?tab=overview death's matter less in ARAM you have to remember.  That ziggs did pretty well.  I'm not sure if he got an S since he was on the other team.

You can check his average stats here https://lolalytics.com/aram/las/platinum/plus/champion/Ziggs/  8/2/22 isn't a great score.  It is a decidedly average score.  Remember, S ranks are far above the average (I am decently sure average is A) but S is like top 90% performance on the champion.  You were literally below every metric except deaths, and had 1 more CS.  You had less deaths, but since it is ARAM, that particular metric doesn't count for as much.


If you can't show me your score is great, there is no reason for you to be grumpy, and waste the message board space just to get a lame comment out...

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

grading is based on _average_ performance OF THAT ***SPECIFIC*** CHAMPION at similar MMR (in the same role, in SR). performance and grading of _other_ champions has nothing to do with it.

8 is a very low number for aram ziggs
Its ziggs in aram, the average is probably just as high, so beeing over average is like stupid high levels.
